qrList.label: init
qrList.message:
/echo Initializing |

/if left={{lastMessageId}} rule=neq right=0 "/abort" |

/setvar key=pworldsaved false

qrList.label: userprocess
qrList.message:
/setvar key=userinput {{input}} |

/if left=pworldsaved rule=eq right=false else={:
  /setvar key=world {{getvar::pworld}}
:}
{:
  /setvar key=pworld {{getvar::world}} |
  /setvar key=pworldsaved true
:} |

/run websimai.hastextform |
/if left={{pipe}} rule=eq right=false "/run websimai.debloathtml" |

/flushvar nadanada

qrList.label: aiprocess
qrList.message:
/if left={{lastMessageId}} right=0 rule=eq "/abort" |

/pass ... |
/if left={{lastMessage}} rule=eq right={{pipe}} "/abort" |

/run websimai.hastextform |
/if left={{pipe}} rule=eq right=false "/run websimai.debloathtml"

qrList.label: debloathtml
qrList.message:
/flushvar toreplace |
/setvar key=regexflags gi |

/setvar key=regex <style>[\S\s]+?<\/style>\|<(?!\!--\|\/?thinking\|\/?meter\|\/?progress\|\/?data\|\/?a \|\/?img)\/?[\S\s]*?>\|(?<=\n)[^\n\S]+(?!\n\n[^\s]) |
/regex name=regexreplace {{lastMessage}} |
/setvar key=msg |

/setvar key=regexflags gmi |
/setvar key=regex (?<=<a[^\n<]+?href=['"][^\n<]+?)['"][\S\s]*?> |
/setvar key=toreplace zz zz |
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::msg}} |
/setvar key=msg |

/setvar key=regex (?<=<img[^\n<]+?src=['"][^\n<]+?)['"][\S\s]*?>\|<img[^\n<]+?src=['"]\|<a[^\n<]+?href=['"] |
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::msg}} |
/setvar key=msg |

/setvar key=regex zz |
/flushvar toreplace |
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::msg}} |
/setvar key=msg |

/setvar key=regexflags gi |
/setvar key=regex (?<=[^\n]\n)\n+\|^\s+\|\s+$ |
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::msg}} |
/setvar key=msg <details>
<summary>TEXT FORM</summary>
{{pipe}}
</details>

|

/sendas name="{{char}}" |
/sub {{lastMessageId}} 1 |
/hide {{pipe}}

qrList.label: FixCSS
qrList.title: Click this if you see this error in the HTML: CSS ERROR: Error: :1:24: missing '}'
qrList.message:
/setvar key=msg {{lastMessage}} |

/flushvar toreplace |
/setvar key=regexflags gmi |
/setvar key=regex (?<=<style>[\S\s]*?)\n+(?=[\S\s]*?<\/style>) |
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::msg}} |
/setvar key=msg |

/sendas name="{{char}}" |

/sub {{lastMessageId}} 1 |
/cut {{pipe}}

qrList.label: hastextform
qrList.message:
/setvar key=startregex <summary> |
/setvar key=endregex </summary> |
/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{lastMessage}} |

/run creamsan.regextract |
/if left={{pipe}} rule=in right="text form" else="/pass false" "/pass true"
